filters.label: Reservation Status
filters.options:
All
Arrival
In House
No Show

name: Arrivals
query:
with date_filter as (
  select d.for_date , date_actual from dim_date d join `tabProperty Setting` s on s.name = %(property)s where d.date_actual = coalesce(NULL , s.business_date)
)
select 
 r.room,
  COALESCE(room_status.lookup_key, 'N/A') AS room_status,
  r.base_rate,
  r.guest,
  r.name,
  r.departure,
  r.room_type,
  COALESCE(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT cc.comment SEPARATOR '</br>'), 'No Guest Comments') AS guest_comment,
  COALESCE(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT rc.comment SEPARATOR '</br>'), 'No Reservation Comments') AS reservation_comment,
  COALESCE(ooo_status.lookup_key, 'N/A') AS out_of_order_status,
  COALESCE(r.company_profile, 'N/A') AS company_profile,
  COALESCE(r.travel_agent, 'N/A') AS travel_agent,
  COALESCE(rd.out_of_order_reason, 'N/A') AS out_of_order_reason,
  r.creation
  FROM date_filter d
  join tabReservation r on r.arrival = d.date_actual
  join tabCustomer c on r.guest = c.name
  left join `tabGuest Comment` cc on c.name = cc.guest and cc.reservation is null
  left join `tabGuest Comment` rc on c.name = rc.guest and rc.reservation = r.name
  left join room_date rd on r.room = rd.room and d.date_actual = r.arrival
  left join room_date_lookup room_status on room_status.lookup_type = 'room_status' and room_status.lookup_value =coalesce(rd.room_status ,0)
  LEFT JOIN room_date_lookup ooo_status ON ooo_status.lookup_type = 'ooo_status' AND ooo_status.lookup_value = coalesce(rd.out_of_order_status , 0)
 WHERE
 (%(reservation_status)s = 'ALL' OR r.reservation_status = %(reservation_status)s)

  GROUP BY
  r.name,
  r.arrival,
  r.departure,
  r.guest,
  r.room_type,
  r.room,
  r.base_rate,
  r.nights,
  r.adults,
  r.children,
  r.company_profile,
  r.travel_agent,
  r.creation,
  rd.for_date,
  rd.guest_service_status,
  rd.house_keeping_status,
  rd.out_of_order_reason,
  rd.out_of_order_status,
  rd.room_status;
